meanings.definition: The act of carving or engraving on wood.
meanings.sent1: I watched the xylographing of a beautiful design on a wooden block.
meanings.sent2: The artist's xylographing skills were evident in the intricate patterns on the wood.
meanings.sent3: The xylographing of a tiny mouse on a wooden plank made me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her xylographing transformed the plain wood into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The xylographing of the tree on the block was so detailed, it looked real.

meanings.definition: The process of printing from a woodcut.
meanings.sent1: After the xylographing was done, they started printing the image on paper.
meanings.sent2: The xylographing resulted in a clear image that was ready for printing.
meanings.sent3: The xylographing process seemed like magic as the image appeared on the paper.
meanings.sent4: The xylographing brought the artwork to life on the printed page.
meanings.sent5: Watching the xylographing turn into a printed picture was fascinating.

meanings.sent1: The xylographing was so well done that the print looked like a painting.
meanings.sent2: She proudly displayed her collection of xylographing prints on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The xylographing print of the forest scene brought a touch of nature indoors.
meanings.sent4: The xylographing print captured the essence of the artist's vision.
meanings.sent5: The xylographing print of the flower was so vibrant, it seemed to bloom on the paper.
